programme.title: Taken Heart
programme.desc: Action. Kate (Gina Holden), a detective and single mother takes it upon herself to save her daughter when she's kidnapped by a dangerous cartel in Belize

programme.title: Boone: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Action. When fame-seeking reality show bounty hunter, Boone (John Hennigan), attempts to bring down a drug lord and his empire, he uncovers more than he bargains for and learns that justice means more than ratings

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Action and Sci-Fi with Mark Wahlberg. In the absence of Optimus Prime, a battle for survival has commenced between the human race and the Transformers

programme.title: Real Steel
programme.desc: Sci-fi action. Set in the near future, where robot boxing is top sport, a struggling promoter (Hugh Jackman) may have found a champion in a discarded robot plus a chance to connect with his 11-year-old estranged son

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama. A young man raised by scientists on Mars returns to Earth to find his father

programme.title: Overdrive
programme.desc: Action. A notorious crime boss forces two legendary car thieves to steal a vehicle to win back their freedom. Joined by two beautiful women, the team has one week to pull off the daring heist or risk losing everything, including their lives

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: A North Korean detective (Hyun Bin) works with his South Korean counterpart (Yoo Hae-jin) to take down a crime boss (Ju-hyuk Kim)

programme.title: XXX: Return Of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Action thriller. Operative Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) comes out of self-imposed exile to recover a powerful weapon. Recruiting a group of thrill-seeking cohorts, Xander finds himself caught up in a deadly conspiracy of corruption among world governments

programme.title: The Hunt For Red October
programme.desc: Cold war thriller, Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin. A Soviet nuclear missile sub that is being tracked by an American submarine suddenly goes silent and "disappears". When it is determined that the silent Soviet Boomer may be headed for American coastal waters panic ensues

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed
programme.desc: Action. Scott Adkins reprises his role as Yuri Boyka in the fourth installment of this martial arts franchise. Boyka accidentally kills an opponent in the ring, forcing him to question everything he's worked for

programme.title: The Hunt For Red October

programme.title: SuperBob
programme.desc: Action comedy, Brett Goldstein, Catherine Tate, Natalia Tena. Robert Kenner, a mild mannered postman from London was struck by a meteor which bestowed him with super powers. Today, Bob is an overworked under-appreciated civil servant who has his first date in six years

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: Adventure. A group of Yale students studying a medieval site, travel back in time to France circa 1357, amid archaic war, deadly diseases and other unexpected pitfalls, to rescue their professor (Billy Connolly)

programme.title: Thor: The Dark World
programme.desc: Action adventure with Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman. When the vengeful leader of a primordial race seeks to destroy the Nine Realms, the god of thunder reunites with Jane Foster and prepares to make the ultimate sacrifice to save the world from certain destruction

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: Action. In this stand-alone spin-off, Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) is summoned to Japan at the behest of the dying Yashida, head of Japan's largest, most powerful tech giant, who implores Wolverine to protect his granddaughter whom he has chosen to take over the business

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Action. Patrick Bergin, Uma Thurman. After Saxon nobleman Robert Hode (Bergin) confronts Sir Folcanet about his cruel aggression against villagers, Folcanet demands that Baron Daguerre punish Hode. but he escapes to Sherwood Forest where he becomes Robin Hood

programme.title: The Osiris Child
programme.desc: Action and adventure starring Kellan Lutz and Daniel Macpherson. Set in the future in a time of interplanetary colonization, an unlikely pair race against an impending global crisis and are confronted by the monsters that live inside us all

programme.title: Kill'em All
programme.desc: Action with Jean-Claude Van Damme. A mysterious stranger arrives at a hospital after being wounded during a massive shootout. Foreign agents pursue him into the hospital, catching doctors and nurses in the crossfire

programme.title: Dark Paradise
programme.desc: Thriller. A female business woman gets in over her head after inheriting some money and encountering a dangerous bad boy in Hawaii

programme.title: Flight Of The Intruder
programme.desc: Action. A bereaved bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorised air strike on Hanoi itself. The raid lands the duo in hot water, until peace talks collapse and President Nixon authorises a new strike. Danny Glover, Willem Dafoe, Brad Johnson

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: A story inspired by "The Canterbury Tales" starring Heath Ledger. When his master dies, a young squire with a gift for jousting hits the road with his two cohorts to prove himself a worthy knight

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: Drama with Mark Wahlberg. An account of Boston Police Commissioner Ed Davis's actions in the events leading up to the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and its aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists behind it

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: Action. Col. Matrix (Schwarzenegger) is living quietly with his daughter when she's kidnapped by an exiled dictator. His plan is to reinstate himself in power by eliminating his country's president, using Matrix to kill the president, to stop him killing the daughter

programme.title: Honeymoon From Hell
programme.desc: Horror. On her honeymoon, a woman learns a girl who died of a broken heart haunts the bed and breakfast that she and her husband are staying in. When a hurricane strands them at the house, she learns the legends about the ghost are all too real

programme.title: Nerve
programme.desc: Thriller with Emma Roberts. Vee Delmonico, a high school senior is pressured into joining the popular online game of truth or dare. She soon finds herself caught up in the competition which requires her to perform stunts that ultimately will determine her entire future

programme.desc: Action with J.K. Simmons. In the war-torn Bosnian capital of Sarajevo, US Navy Seal Matt Barnes leads a band of renegades on a covert operation to rescue treasure from the bottom of a lake

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: Sci-fi action thriller concerning a maverick New Orleans-based ATF agent (Denzel Washington) who is brought in on a top-secret government program to catch the terrorist responsible for a ferry bombing that kills hundreds. Paula Patton, Val Kilmer, Jim Caviezel co-star

programme.title: Biker Boyz

programme.title: Of Mind And Music
programme.desc: In this documentary companion to Charlie's Country, Australian actor David Gulpilil tells the story of when his people's way of life was derailed by ours

programme.title: The Ottoman Lieutenant
programme.desc: Drama starring Michiel Huisman and Hera Hilmar. The Ottoman Lieutenant is a love story between an idealistic American nurse and a Turkish officer in World War I

programme.title: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure. Ayden, a young girl in Medieval Europe, is the only person who can save Christmas after a dying elf gives her a magic crystal. Ayden and other orphans must escape fantasy creatures to bring enchantment back to the North

programme.title: Six Dance Lessons In Six Weeks
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Gina Rowlands and Cheyenne Jackson. A retired woman hires a dance instructor to give her private dance lessons at her home; one per week for six weeks. What begins as an antagonistic relationship turns into a close friendship as they dance together

programme.title: The House On Carroll Street
programme.desc: Thriller with Kelly McGillis and Jeff Daniels. In 1950s America, an FBI agent and a blacklist victim uncover a plot to smuggle Nazi war criminals into the country

programme.title: Django
programme.desc: Drama. Romani jazz musician Django Reinhardt (Reda Kateb) manages to survive in Nazi-occupied France due to his fame as a performer. However, he faces a difficult choice when he's asked to participate in Germany's propaganda efforts

programme.title: A Midsummer's Hawaiian Dream
programme.desc: This romantic comedy follows two married anthropology professors and two of their students on a trip to Hawaii, as they attempt to recover an ancient relic from a doomed jungle. Unfortunately, their plans are sent awry when a shaman casts a love spell on them

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Adventure. This follow-up finds Percy and Annabeth racing out to the Bermuda Triangle in search of the Golden Fleece. In their quest to confront the ultimate evil, Percy and friends battle swarms of mythical creatures with powers far beyond human comprehension

programme.title: Made Of Honor
programme.desc: Romantic comedy with Patrick Dempsey and Michelle Monaghan. Tom loves his life, until he realizes he also loves his best friend Hannah. When she gets engaged and asks Tom to be her maid of honor, he attempts to create the perfect wedding...and steal the bride

programme.title: Life On The Line
programme.desc: Action with John Travolta and Kate Bosworth. A crew of men who do the high-wire work of fixing the electrical grid are hit by a sudden deadly storm

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Hilary Swank and Gerard Butler. A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Hilary Swank and Gerard Butler. A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life

programme.title: China Moon
programme.desc: Romantic thriller with Ed Harris and Madeleine Stowe. Detective Kyle Bodine falls for the sultry Rachel Munro, who is trapped in a violent marriage. After she accidentally shoots her husband, Kyle finds himself on the wrong side of the law he is duty-bound to enforce

programme.title: The Lennon Report
programme.desc: Drama. The unheard true story of the moments after John Lennon was shot as seen through the eyes of those who lived it. Alan Weiss, an ambitious news producer, finds himself in a position to break the biggest story of the year following a violent motorcycle accident

programme.title: The House On Carroll Street

programme.title: Shooting For Socrates
programme.desc: Comedy drama set in Belfast against the backdrop of the 1986 World Cup. It tells the story of a momentous time in Northern Ireland's football history through the eyes of players, fans and the media, following the lives of passionate supporters Arthur and Tommy

programme.title: A Quiet Passion
programme.desc: A biographical drama detailing the life of 19th century American poet Emily Dickinson (Cynthia Nixon), from her early days as a young schoolgirl to her later years as a reclusive, unrecognized artist

programme.title: A Monster Calls
programme.desc: Drama, Sigourney Weaver, Felicity Jones. A boy attempts to deal with his mother's illness and the bullying of his classmates by escaping to a fantastical world

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: Drama with Gillian Anderson. In 1947, Lord Mountbatten assumes the post of last Viceroy, charged with handing India back to its people, living upstairs at the house which was the home of British rulers, whilst 500 Hindu, Muslim and Sikh servants lived downstairs

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young man named Tristan tries to win the heart of the beautiful Victoria by venturing into the magical realm to retrieve a fallen star. Adventure starring Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Typically outrageous comedy from the Farrelly brothers. Jack Black stars as Hal, a shallow man who falls in love with an obese woman (Gwyneth Paltrow) after being hypnotised into seeing only 'inner beauty'

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Based on the 80's TV action/drama, this movie focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined. Action with Colin Farrell and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Based on the 80's TV action/drama, this movie focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined. Action with Colin Farrell and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: D-Tox
programme.desc: Action thriller with Sylvester Stallone as a cop who checks into a psychiatric hospital after witnessing a brutal killing, only to find that he hasn''t escaped the spectre of violence

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Drama with Bryan Cranston and Jennifer Garner. A man's nervous breakdown causes him to leave his wife and live in his attic for several months

programme.title: Shooting For Socrates
programme.desc: Comedy drama set in Belfast against the backdrop of the 1986 World Cup. It tells the story of a momentous time in Northern Ireland's football history through the eyes of players, fans and the media, following the lives of passionate supporters Arthur and Tommy

programme.title: A Quiet Passion
programme.desc: A biographical drama detailing the life of 19th century American poet Emily Dickinson (Cynthia Nixon), from her early days as a young schoolgirl to her later years as a reclusive, unrecognized artist

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: Drama with Gillian Anderson. In 1947, Lord Mountbatten assumes the post of last Viceroy, charged with handing India back to its people, living upstairs at the house which was the home of British rulers, whilst 500 Hindu, Muslim and Sikh servants lived downstairs

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young man named Tristan tries to win the heart of the beautiful Victoria by venturing into the magical realm to retrieve a fallen star. Adventure starring Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: Judy Moody And The Not Bummer Summer
programme.desc: Family-friendly adventure that finds mischievous third grader Judy Moody experiencing a summer she'll never forget. Jordana Beatty, Heather Graham and Parris Mosteller star

programme.title: Fluke
programme.desc: Drama. Tom (Matthew Modine), a workaholic, all but ignores his family. Tom's perspective changes when he dies in a car accident and is reincarnated as Fluke, a big brown dog. Fluke attempts to reconnect with his wife and son, but gets lost trying to make his way home

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: Action with Lucas Till and Jane Levy. Tripp builds a Monster Truck from scrapped cars. After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange a subterranean creature, he may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: An overworked executive Bob Munro persuades his wife and children to give up their Hawaiian vacation for some 'family bonding' on a cross-country RV trip. Family adventure starring Robin Williams

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: Action Adventure starring Andy Serkis and Judy Greer. After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Musical comedy. Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, Hailee Steinfeld. After the highs of winning the World Championships, the now separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition overseas to make music, and some questionable decisions

programme.title: Hustle And Flow
programme.desc: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful rapper. Drama with Terrence Howard and Anthony Anderson

programme.desc: A romantic musical based on Verdi's La Traviata, telling the story of a young poet/writer (Ewan McGregor) who falls in love with the terminally-ill cabaret actress and courtesan of the Moulin Rouge (Nicole Kidman)

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A male scientist must become pregnant in order to test a new fertility drug. Comedy starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito

programme.desc: A successful psychiatrist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients tracks him down during his family vacation. Comedy starring Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss

programme.desc: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend. Family adventure starring Bruce Allpress and Geraldine Brophy

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Drama and thriller starring Mark Wahlberg, Kurt Russell and John Malkovich. A story set on the offshore drilling rig Deepwater Horizon, which exploded during April 2010 and created the worst oil spill in U.S. history

programme.title: Jason Bourne

programme.title: Killer Toon
programme.desc: Crime and Horror starring Si-Young Lee and Ki-Joon Uhm. A series of murders resembling Ji-yoon’s horror webcomic drawings occur and detective Ki-chul unravels the terrifying truth of the comics himself

programme.title: The Last King
programme.desc: In this historical action film set in the 13th century during Norway's civil war, two men must protect a young boy, the king's only heir, from being assassinated

programme.title: Deadly Expose
programme.desc: Thriller. When several carnal murders in a small beach town are linked to the public release of a discreet dating app's client information, detective Maxine Payton suspects the killer may be someone intimately close to her

programme.title: Independents' Day
programme.desc: Action. Aliens invade, this time delivering a clear ultimatum. The fate of humanity hangs in the balance as the U.S. President and citizens decide if these aliens are to be trusted ...or feared

programme.title: Micropolis
programme.desc: Animation. Rafy, a shy mongoose, falls in love with celebrated mongoose diva Onin but their idyllic lives are threatened when Rascal, the leader of the shrews, decides to take control of their Micropolis city

programme.title: Last Wizard
programme.desc: Animation. Follows the story of Aldana, a nine-year-old girl, who decides to escape from a boring theatrical performance, she follows Jeremiah, an old magician, who leads her into the realm of Bilembambudin

programme.title: Legend Of The Sea
programme.desc: Family animation with the voice of Rob Schneider. The peaceful reign of the Dragon King is shattered when the evil octopus Ocho unleashes her vengeance upon the kingdom. Draco, the prince, is the only one who knows of her plans and leaps into action to stop her

programme.title: Felix The Toy Rabbit And The Time Machine
programme.desc: Animation. When Sophie pays a visit to the Museum of Natural Sciences, Professor Snork is working on a new time machine. Suddenly, Woolly, a tiny mammoth and Gertrude, a sea turtle materialise besides to Felix

programme.title: The Wheelers
programme.desc: Animation. A small group of friends calling themselves "The Wheelers" patrol the streets on their skateboards to protect their neighbourhood from vandals and crime. One day they meet BUFO a friendly alien on the run from the sinister Air Defence Bureau

programme.title: Pacific Pirates
programme.desc: Animation. Young Alberto finds himself on an adventure of a lifetime after falling through a time window & appearing in the port of Callao in the XVII century just as Dutch pirate Jacques L'Hermite is about to attack

programme.title: Operation Arctic
programme.desc: A large scale adventure story for the whole family! Three Norwegian kids, Julia and her twin siblings, Ida and Sindre, stow away on a military helicopter to visit their father, but become marooned on a deserted Half Moon island by a tragic mistake

programme.title: Micropolis

programme.title: Road Less Traveled
programme.desc: Romance. Charlotte struggles to balance her upcoming wedding with her career. She searches for answers in her hometown, where she runs into her high school sweetheart, which prompts Charlotte to wonder what life would have been like if she'd never left

programme.title: Sometimes Always Never
programme.desc: Drama about words and loss. It tells the story of a family with an exceptional Scrabble vocabulary who cannot put their words to use and communicate with each other and their journey to reconnect. Bill Nighy and Jenny Agutter star

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
programme.desc: Family animation. Dracula, Mavis, Johnny and the rest of the Drac Pack take a vacation on a luxury Monster Cruise Ship, where Dracula falls in love with the ship's captain, Ericka, who's secretly a descendant of Abraham Van Helsing, the notorious monste

programme.title: Slipaway
programme.desc: Drama. When a homeless young musician moves into a sailboat with a spirited elderly widow, the two must overcome their differences and haunting pasts to unlock each other's dreams

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Chadwick Boseman and Lupita Nyong'o .T'Challa, the new ruler of the advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must defend his land from being torn apart by enemies from outside and inside the country

programme.title: Little Pink House
programme.desc: Drama. Susette Kelo (Catherine Keener), a small-town nurse, fights against the eminent domain seizure of her home, all the way to the Supreme Court

programme.title: My Little Pony: The Movie
programme.desc: Animation. After a dark force conquers Canterlot, the Mane 6 embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria where they meet new friends and exciting challenges on a quest to use the magic of friendship to save their homeland

programme.title: Power Rangers
programme.desc: Action following five ordinary teens who must become something extraordinary when they learn that their small town...and the world, is on the verge of being obliterated by an alien threat

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: Action. Samuel L. Jackson, Ryan Reynolds. The world's top bodyguard is called upon to guard the life of his mortal enemy who is set to testify at the International Court of Justice. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time

programme.title: I Feel Pretty
programme.desc: Comedy starring Amy Schumer. A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?

programme.title: Voice From The Stone
programme.desc: Drama and Thriller. Set in 1950s Tuscany, Voice from the Stone is the haunting and suspenseful story of Verena, a solemn nurse drawn to aid a young boy who has fallen silent since the sudden passing of his mother

programme.desc: Comedy. Simon Hayes, an author, is ashamed to have written a series of romance novels under the pen name, Sally Carmichael. When Simon is forced to meet a top box office star, his carefully built life of anonymity starts crumbling down around him

programme.title: Runaway Romance
programme.desc: Drama. Reality TV star Ann Stanway (Danielle C. Ryan) leaves Hollywood and finds herself in an Amish country where she discovers friendship, new love and ultimately herself. She must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one

programme.title: Sherlock Gnomes
programme.desc: Animation. After a string of garden gnome disappearances in London, Gnomeo and Juliet look to legendary detective Sherlock Gnomes to solve the case of their missing friends and family

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure
programme.desc: Action and Sci-Fi starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario. Young hero Thomas embarks on a mission to find a cure for a deadly disease known as "The Flare"

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Action, Dwayne Johnson, Neve Campbell. Framed and on the run, Will Sawyer, a former FBI agent, must save his family from a blazing fire in the world's tallest building, clear his name and find the truth behind the attack on the Hong Kong skyscraper

programme.title: Show Dogs
programme.desc: Adventure and comedy. Max, a macho, solitary Rottweiler police dog is ordered to go undercover as a primped show dog in a prestigious Dog Show, along with his human partner, to avert a disaster from happening

programme.title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Biographical drama. After leaving London for the English countryside, writer A.A. Milne starts to spin fanciful yarns about his son's growing collection of stuffed animals. These stories form the basis for "Winnie-the-Pooh" published in 1926

programme.title: Bel Ami
programme.desc: Erotic drama set late-18th century, starring Robert Pattinson as a destitute young soldier who plots to gain power by seducing the mistresses of Paris' most influential men. Uma Thurman & Kristin Scott Thomas co-star

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: Drama with Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman. The GM for Oakland Athletics is about to turn baseball on its ear when he uses statistical data to analyze and place value on the players he picks

programme.title: Shall We Dance ?
programme.desc: A lonely workaholic happens to see a beautiful woman in the window of a dance studio on a train ride home from the office. He promptly signs up for evening lessons. Romance with Richard Gere and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Chocolate City
programme.desc: Drama starring Robert Ri'chard, Tyson Beckford, DeRay Davis. Life for a struggling college student changes in an instant when he meets the owner of a male strip club who convinces him to give amateur night a whirl

programme.title: Bridge Of Spies
programme.desc: Thriller with Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance. The Soviet Union captures U.S. pilot Francis Gary Powers after shooting down his plane. Sentenced to 10 years in prison, Powers' only hope is a lawyer recruited by the CIA to negotiate his release

programme.title: Lords Of Dogtown
programme.desc: Biopic starring Heath Ledger, John Robinson and Emile Hirsch following the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in the 1970s in a rough-and-tumble Venice, California community known as "Dogtown"

programme.title: So Undercover
programme.desc: Comedy. A private investigator (Miley Cyrus) goes undercover as a sorority girl to protect a coed whose father is set to testify against a mobster. Meanwhile, the antics of her sorority "sisters" repeatedly test both her patience and willingness to maintain her cover

programme.title: White Oleander
programme.desc: A teenager journeys through a series of foster homes after her mother goes to prison for committing a crime of passion

programme.title: Shall We Dance ?
programme.desc: A lonely workaholic happens to see a beautiful woman in the window of a dance studio on a train ride home from the office. He promptly signs up for evening lessons. Romance with Richard Gere and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: No Strings Attached
programme.desc: Lifelong friends Adam (Ashton Kutcher) and Emma (Natalie Portman) attempt to avoid falling in love after falling into each other's beds in this comedy exploring the complexities and quirks of friends with benefits

programme.title: Autumn In New York
programme.desc: An older playboy finally finds true love when he meets a passionate younger woman. He soon learns that their time together will be short because of her terminal illness. Comedy with Richard Gere and Winona Ryder

programme.title: Autumn In New York
programme.desc: An older playboy finally finds true love when he meets a passionate younger woman. He soon learns that their time together will be short because of her terminal illness. Comedy with Richard Gere and Winona Ryder

programme.title: The Full Monty
programme.desc: British comedy about 6 jobless men who form a strip group to earn extra cash. Although they are not tanned or toned like the pros, they are willing to go all the way by giving their audience the proverbial full Monty

programme.title: The Cat In The Hat
programme.desc: Adventure comedy. Mike Myers, Dakota Fanning, Spencer Breslin. Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them

programme.title: The Beautiful Country
programme.desc: Drama. After reuniting with his mother in Ho Chi Minh City, a family tragedy causes Binh to flee from Viet Nam to America. Landing in New York, Binh begins a road trip to Texas, where his American father is said to live

programme.title: Bridge Of Spies
programme.desc: Thriller with Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance. The Soviet Union captures U.S. pilot Francis Gary Powers after shooting down his plane. Sentenced to 10 years in prison, Powers' only hope is a lawyer recruited by the CIA to negotiate his release

programme.title: Lords Of Dogtown
programme.desc: Biopic starring Heath Ledger, John Robinson and Emile Hirsch following the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in the 1970s in a rough-and-tumble Venice, California community known as "Dogtown"

programme.title: Meet The Parents
programme.desc: Comedy. Robert De Niro, Owen Wilson. Greg Focker (Ben Stiller) is poised to propose to his girlfriend Pam (Teri Polo) during a weekend stay at her parents' home. But first, he needs to ask her ex-CIA father first

programme.title: Twice Born
programme.desc: Romantic war drama, Penelope Cruz, Emile Hirsch. Having fled when civil war erupted, vivid memories of an ill-fated love affair and the many ways that the harrowing experience shaped her into the person she is today stir a mother returning to Sarajevo with her teen son

programme.title: Two For The Money
programme.desc: After suffering a career-ending injury, a former college football star finds himself recruited by one of the most well-known bookies in the sports-gambling business. Drama starring Al Pacino and Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: A Home At The End Of The World
programme.desc: Romantic drama. Colin Farrell, Dallas Roberts, Robin Wright. A boy who has experienced many losses in his life grows to manhood and enters into a love triangle with a woman and his boyhood friend

programme.title: Shall We Dance ?
programme.desc: A lonely workaholic happens to see a beautiful woman in the window of a dance studio on a train ride home from the office. He promptly signs up for evening lessons. Romance with Richard Gere and Jennifer Lopez

programme.title: Bel Ami
programme.desc: Erotic drama set late-18th century, starring Robert Pattinson as a destitute young soldier who plots to gain power by seducing the mistresses of Paris' most influential men. Uma Thurman & Kristin Scott Thomas co-star

programme.title: Diana
programme.desc: Biopic starring Naomi Watts as the ill-fated Princess of Wales. Set during the last two years of Princess Di's life, the film details her much-publicised divorce from Prince Charles and her clandestine affair with heart surgeon Dr. Hasnat Khan (Naveen Andrews)

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: Bryan must stop an act of biological terrorism when invasive species are stolen from the Global Seed Bank in Norway

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Charlie team up to get to the bottom of a string of random disappearances. Meanwhile, Jack believes that he has found a case and convinces Dean to partner-up with him on the hunt

programme.desc: While Red fights in court to clear his name of treason once and for all, Liz and the Task Force investigate a Blacklister who has a reputation for leveraging dark secrets

programme.title: Blindspot
programme.desc: Reade confronts Zapata, while the team follows a lead to a potential cure for Jane

programme.title: Band Of Brothers

programme.title: Preacher
programme.desc: Tulip's plan to rescue Jesse exposes his troubled family history. Cassidy refuses to leave Angelville without Tulip

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords
programme.desc: After rejecting Murray for spending too much time with another band, Bret and Jemaine find success managing themselves and land a deal to record an ad jingle

programme.desc: With the ward's fate up in the air, DiDi hunts for ways to save it. Varla returns and butts heads with her equally opinionated daughter. Caught in a heap of lies, Jenna comes clean to her husband. After a memorial service full of drama, the staff gets a rude awakening

programme.title: The Last Outlaw
programme.desc: Western action starring Mickey Rourke, Dermot Mulroney, Ted Levine. After a bloodbath of a robbery, and then being betrayed by his men, the leader of a criminal gang of Wild West thugs joins the side of the law to hunt down his enemies and kill them one by one

programme.title: Crime Of The Century
programme.desc: Dramatization starring Stephen Rea, Isabella Rossellini, and J.T. Walsh, based on the true story of Bruno Hauptmann who was convicted and put to death for the kidnapping and murder of Charles Lindberg's son in a case still regarded as a travesty of justice

programme.title: The Last Truck: The Closing Of A GM Plant
programme.desc: In the wake of General Motor's closure of the Moraine, Ohio plant, stunned workers looked back at their careers. Through their words, this documentary stands as an elegy to a dying American manufacturing system - and a timely look at the U.S. auto industry in crisis

programme.title: Truman
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the story of Harry S. Truman (Gary Sinise) and his role in the second World War. Chronicling Truman's rise from unknown farmer to infamous American President who is chiefly remembered for being the first to use the atomic bomb

programme.title: El Diablo
programme.desc: Western starring Anthony Edwards, Louis Gossett, Jr. A bespectacled schoolteacher, with the help of a down-to-earth gunslinger, is forced to summon up his courage to expedite the rescue of his prettiest female student who has been kidnapped by a notorious bandit leader

programme.title: Primo
programme.desc: A one-man drama adapted by actor-playwright Antony Sher from the memoir of Holocaust survivor Primo Levi (1919-1987). In quiet but unsparing language, Primo (Sher) narrates the story of how he, an Italian-Jewish chemist, was captured by the Nazis and sent to Auschwitz

programme.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel
programme.desc: Fast, funny and farcical, this sci-fi comedy follows three social misfits - two geeks and a cynic - as they attempt to navigate a time-travel conundrum in the middle of a British pub. Chris O'Dowd, Dean Lennox Kelly, Marc Wootton and Anna Faris star

programme.title: Shooter

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords

programme.title: A Number
programme.desc: Drama. Bernard 2 (Rhys Ifans) discovers he is a clone of his brother. His father, Salter (Tom Wilkinson), explains he agreed to an experiment to bring back his dead son. Bernard 1 is very much alive though, and unbeknownst to Salter the doctors made several clones

programme.title: Wit
programme.desc: Drama starring Emma Thompson, Christopher Lloyd, Eileen Atkins. A college professor learns she has advanced ovarian cancer and only a short time to live, which gives her a sudden and dramatic insight into the importance of kindness and compassion

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Bob Lee visits a friend of his father's to get more answers about Earl's rogue operation during the Vietnam War. He then joins the others to crash a black-tie event in D.C., where they cross paths with an operative on a mission of his own

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords

programme.desc: This documentary explores how the NFL, America's most popular sports organisation, is confronting the enormous challenge of making the game safer, chronicling the physical toll of the game on its players - a subject that has taken centre stage in recent years

programme.desc: Between democracy and government graft, this film explores the situation of a country where the powerful and partisan media seems to have confiscated the people's voice, and unearths the dream of a Brazil that could reinvent itself as a model for the whole continent

programme.title: The Tears Of Sichuan Province
programme.desc: The 2008 Sichuan earthquake killed around 70,000 people - of which 10,000 were children. This documentary focuses on the aftermath and grieving families and communities of the children, as they mourn their loss and question the government over construction standards

programme.title: Love Child
programme.desc: 2010, a South Korean baby died of malnutrition because her parents were playing games online. Ordinarily this would be a clear case of negligence, but this documentary looks at the way South Korea's Internet infrastructure has adversely affected its communal society

programme.title: Soufra
programme.desc: The story of intrepid social entrepreneur Mariam Shaar - a generational refugee who has spent her entire life in the Burj El Barajneh refugee camp just south of Beirut, Lebanon - who set out against all odds to change her fate by launching a successful catering company

programme.title: Trophy
programme.desc: This in-depth look into the powerhouse industries of big-game hunting, breeding and wildlife conservation in the U.S. and Africa unravels the complex consequences of treating animals as commodities

programme.title: We'll Meet Again
programme.desc: Join Ann Curry for the dramatic reunions of people who lost touch after the civil rights movement. Fatima hopes to thank Thelma for her courage in the face of racism, and Sherie searches for the friend who inspired her commitment to social justice

programme.title: For Neda
programme.desc: June 20th, 2009, Neda Agha-Soltan became another tragic casualty in the Iranian protests following the recent presidential election results. Unlike many of the unknown victims, she instantly became a worldwide symbol of the struggle. This documentary tells Neda's story

programme.title: I Am An Animal
programme.desc: Documentary. A candid and introspective look at the extreme beliefs and motives of Ingrid Newkirk, the British-born co-founder and driving force behind People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), the world's largest animal-rights organization

programme.title: I Am An Animal
programme.desc: Documentary. A candid and introspective look at the extreme beliefs and motives of Ingrid Newkirk, the British-born co-founder and driving force behind People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), the world's largest animal-rights organization

programme.title: Triangle: Remembering The Fire
programme.desc: In March 1911, a catastrophic fire broke out at the Triangle Waist Company in NYC. Trapped inside the ten-story building, 146 workers were burned alive or forced to jump to their deaths to escape an inferno that consumed the factory in just 18 minutes

programme.title: Sharp Objects
programme.desc: Concerned for the safety of Amma, Camille puts her own life in jeopardy as she gets closer to the truth behind the shocking mysteries surrounding the Wind Gap killings

programme.title: Tell Me You Love Me
programme.desc: May offers up a novel idea for David and Katie to save their marriage. Coming to terms with their infertility, Palek makes a revelation to Carolyn. Later, Carolyn steps up her effort to be made partner at her law firm, and Palek decides to put their house on the market

programme.title: We'll Meet Again
programme.desc: Join Ann Curry for the dramatic reunions of people who lost touch after the civil rights movement. Fatima hopes to thank Thelma for her courage in the face of racism, and Sherie searches for the friend who inspired her commitment to social justice

programme.title: Ricochet
programme.desc: Crime thriller, Denzel Washington, John Lithgow, Ice-T. A psychotic hit man escapes from prison with plans to exact brutal & well-calculated revenge on the then rookie Los Angeles police officer, now Assistant District Attorney, who arrested him some eight years before

programme.title: The Life And Death Of Peter Sellers
programme.desc: Biographical drama about Sellers' turbulent rise from BBC radio performer to one of the world's most gifted comedic actors who struggled to reconcile his relationship with women, his celebrity status and his many selves. Geoffrey Rush, Charlize Theron, Emily Watson

programme.title: Wit
programme.desc: Drama starring Emma Thompson, Christopher Lloyd, Eileen Atkins. A college professor learns she has advanced ovarian cancer and only a short time to live, which gives her a sudden and dramatic insight into the importance of kindness and compassion

programme.title: State Of Play: Culture Shock
programme.desc: This documentary explores how the NFL, America's most popular sports organisation, is confronting the enormous challenge of making the game safer, chronicling the physical toll of the game on its players - a subject that has taken centre stage in recent years

programme.title: Bury My Heart At Wounded Knee
programme.desc: Based on the book by Dee Brown, director Yves Simoneau explores the plight of the American Indian in the later half of the 19th century in this docudrama exploring the effects of westward expansion. Aidan Quinn, Adam Beach, August Schellenberg star

programme.title: Questioning Darwin
programme.desc: This documentary reveals Charles Darwin's internal struggle as he grappled with the implications of his theory of natural selection, and explores the thinking behind modern-day Creationist theory and those who refute evolution

programme.title: Child Labor In Bolivia, The Broken Taboo
programme.desc: Nowadays in Bolivia, children as young as 10 are legally at work. Should it be banned, thus denying a country's social reality? Should it be acknowledged as a way to provide children protection? Will Bolivia's example become a source of inspiration for other countries?

programme.title: Date My Race
programme.desc: Documentary. Natalie Jane, online dating coach and founder of eDateMate provides tips and advice on online dating profiles and in the broader context of how your race plays a part in selecting a partner

programme.title: San Francisco 2.0
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi's documentary takes a look at the future of San Francisco, where the invasion of the tech elite is causing economic divisions and upheaval in a city that has long been the counter-culture capital of the U.S

programme.title: How To Build A Human
programme.desc: A documentary exploring the latest developments in artificial intelligence, actress Gemma Chan (Humans) meets experts in robotics and computer programming from around the world, and visits a project attempting to create a computer more powerful than the human brain

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Robots
programme.desc: This documentary takes a timely and often-unnerving look at the growing dangers that are emerging as automation becomes a greater part of everyday life around the world

programme.title: Bright Lights: Debbie Reynolds & Carrier Fisher
programme.desc: The story of a family's complicated love, this documentary is an intimate portrait of Hollywood royalty in all its eccentricity - Carrie Fisher and her mother, Debbie Reynolds. Featuring vintage family films that bring iconic old-world Hollywood to life

programme.title: The Sisters
programme.desc: The compelling story of twin sisters Cristina and Bella Santiago whose relationship is put to the test with the consequences of their personal choices and the obstacles that fate brings their way

programme.title: Vice Special Report: Fighting ISIS
programme.desc: A first-hand understanding of the rise of the terrorist group and what options the world has to end its reign. Correspondent Ben Anderson embeds with Iraqi fighters and heads to the front lines where Sunni, Shiite and Kurdish forces are fighting for their lives

programme.title: Harrow
programme.desc: When a skeleton is discovered in a suburban backyard, the home owner becomes the prime murder suspect - until Harrow begins to uncover a tragic secret

programme.title: Riverdale

programme.title: Dora The Explorer
programme.desc: This play-along, animated adventure series stars Dora, our seven-year-old heroine who asks preschoolers for their help on her adventures. Along the way, they'll meet friends, overcome obstacles and learn a little English!

programme.title: Zack & Quack
programme.desc: Zack and Quack live inside the most amazing pop-up book ever. It's a place where pulling tabs, flaps and levers makes awesome and unexpected things happen. Exciting new worlds and fantastic voyages literally unfold before our eyes!

programme.title: Kiva Can Do!

programme.desc: A rare 1589 book with the instructions for war and fortification is brought to the shop. Will Rick reinforce a good price, or will he protect his wallet?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When a chair belonging to Abraham Lincoln takes a seat in the shop, will Rick act like Honest Abe and make an offer or will he abolish the deal? Next, a signed Seinfeld script is brought into the shop and 'yada, yada, yada'

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When a WWE Hall of Fame ring is up for grabs, will Rick pin down a deal or will he tap out? Then, Martha Washington brings home the bacon with a 1891 $1 silver certificate. Will Rick and Corey bankroll an offer or will they save it for a rainy day?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A 1906 Silver Half Dollar that belonged to a passenger on the Titanic sails into the shop, as well as a 1936 Zeiss 16mm camera

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When an all-star Dodger's baseball memorabilia bench faces Rick in the bottom of the ninth, will it be a grand slam sale or will he strike out? Then, a 19th century lock box bolts in. Will Corey hold the key to unlock a deal or will it get jammed?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When an original Beach Boys surfboard rides into the shop, will Rick hang ten or will he have a gnarly wipe out? Later, things get psychedelic with an original Peter Max Statue of Liberty painting. Will Rick liberate a deal or will it get torched?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Walk the line with the Pawn Stars when a model train once owned by Johnny Cash chugs into the shop. Will Rick make a bid for the Man in Black or will he be singing the prison blues?

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: Marty brings out the big guns for a final frenzied push out of the brush, Morgan and Margaret make a major breakthrough, Mike battles Kodiak's most treacherous mountain, Jake faces down a pair of predators, and Jason fuels the forge

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: A massive week-long storm tears Morgan's homestead apart; Mike goes on the offensive for the annual awakening of Kodiak's bears; Tom takes on a custom order to celebrate a milestone; and Jason builds a Viking axe that could transform his business

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: When a massive mid-winter storm tears across Alaska, Marty pushes his machine to the limit; Morgan and Margaret race to make the cut before the snow hits; Eustace revives a lucrative business venture; and Jason discovers a hidden bladesmith's bounty

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: Morgan's big day goes bust when his plane breaks down; Mike's supply run across the bay leaves him high and dry; Tom takes on a rare high-value commission; and Jake's dog team hunts down two lions in a marathon high-speed chase

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: Morgan's hits bad weather on his first flight to the homestead; Mike fights icy currents and fading daylight to get supplies to his cabin; Tom runs a gauntlet in search of some late season fur; and Jason forges salvaged airplane parts into cutlery

programme.title: Mountain Men
programme.desc: Marty wraps up trapping season with a record haul of fur; Morgan flies solo for the first time over the towering peaks of the Great Alaska Range; and Eustace digs deep to raise a down payment to buy land before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Former Guns 'n' Roses guitarist DJ Ashba arrives at Count's Kustoms in a 2004 Lamborghini Murcielago that he wants turned into the ultimate 'mancar', but Danny must make sure he includes something special for DJ's wife

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny gets started on a project that he's been waiting a long time to tackle, a 1971 Chevy C10 Pick Up. He plans to flip it for a big profit, but a snafu in the paint department threatens to blow the budget sky high

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny continues his El Caminos love affair with a 1975 beauty. But if he's going to flip this ride for a big profit, the Count's Kustoms crew will have to put aside their differences

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny and the team take on a 1967 Caddy for a high end client, but will Ryan and Danny's plan to match the unique interior with a root beer paint job fly or fizzle?

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny has big plans for a client, but will his twist on a classic Caddy impress the buyer or leave him out of gas? Ryan discovers that smaller jobs aren't always easy, as he tries to put a Count's Kustoms paint job on a high-tech Lego car

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Danny's got himself a new ride, a classic two wheel drive Chevy Blazer that he wants to trick out and flip for a big profit. Meanwhile, Ryan takes Mike out to get a lesson in old school car culture from a couple of customising legends

programme.title: Cars That Made America
programme.desc: A revolutionary machine is set to transform the United States. Men like Henry Ford and the Dodge Brothers lay the groundwork for some of the most influential corporate empires in American history

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: Contenders complete to recreate the deadly Horseman's Axe. Who will join the ranks of Forged In Fire champions and return home with the $10,000 prize?

programme.title: WW2 Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Britain's foremost amateur WWII detectorist, Stephen Taylor, joins forces with Madness front man Suggs, as they uncover and analyse historical finds from across the UK, offering a new perspective on the Second World War and the people it affected

programme.title: WW2 Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Suggs and WWII expert Stephen hunt for souvenirs left by flying ace Douglas Bader and the legendary Duxford Fliers

programme.title: Ice Road Truckers
programme.desc: The spring thaw is in full melt mode as the drivers get one last lick before the ice roads close, where Reno takes a risky final run just to have his truck die on the ice

programme.title: Project Impossible
programme.desc: Original series following a new generation of epic engineering projects considered unthinkable only a few years ago. Each episode features multiple stories illustrating man-made projects that are crucial to our future

programme.title: Milwaukee Blacksmith
programme.desc: Veteran blacksmith Kent Knapp and his three sons put their 5,000-year-old craft to the test as they take on a commission for a one-of-a-kind Death Star firepit

programme.title: Milwaukee Blacksmith

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: The bar is raised for four smiths when they must forge the iconic KA-BAR military blade using only tiny cubes of W-1 steel. Getting them combat-ready is only half the battle as the judges will subject them to two brutal tests

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: The bladesmiths must choose wisely as they are asked to dumpster dive for the right steel to be turned into a War Hammer. They return to pound their way to victory

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: The bladesmiths are asked to forge a weapon from cable steel. After two rounds, only two are left to forge an Egyptian Khopesh. The weapons are then tested

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: After being asked to forge a blade with just fire and their bare hands, only two bladesmiths will move on to the final round where they have five days to create the iconic Scottish Claymore, the legendary weapon of William Wallace

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: Three is the magic number as the bladesmiths are asked to forge three or more metals into a blade of their signature style. Despite pain and failure, two move on to the final round, returning home to forge a legendary spiked shield

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: Four bladesmiths must salvage material from a car and forge a blade in a race against time. Only two will speed through to the final round, where they have five days to create a Viking sword

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: Four bladesmiths are tasked with the challenge of shaping four different types of metal into a deadly weapon. Only two will survive and they'll have five days to create one of the most lethal weapons in military history, the Nepalese Kukri

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: Four bladesmiths must forge high carbon steel and wrought iron into a fully functional weapon. Only two will move to the final round, where they have five days to create one of the most beautifully designed blades in history, the Ethiopian shotel

programme.title: James Nesbitt: Disasters That Changed Britain
programme.desc: In the 1950s, the tower block was born. But by the 1970s, these cities in the sky became slums. In 2017, missed warnings, vague regulations and corners cut in favour of financial return resulted in the deadliest tower block fire in British history

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: After years of searching, the team may have located a previously discovered artefact that has been missing for more than a century. In Smith's Cove, the Laginas struggle to hold back the waters

programme.title: Frontiersmen
programme.desc: Davy Crockett makes a stand at The Alamo while President Polk risks war with Britain and Mexico, sending John Fremont and Kit Carson on a secret mission that ignites a war for California and the Pacific

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Series examining UFO sightings, alien abductions and government cover-ups, beginning with an investigation into multiple sightings of bright lights in Illinois in 2004

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: India's Sanskrit texts are filled with incredible stories about advanced technology in the ancient world. Might this period of time actually be referring to an age when extraterrestrials inhabited the planet?

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: Ever since Roswell, observers have noted that UFOs allegedly appear in locations that are already full of secrets and mystery: namely, weapons labs. The question is, why?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: What is the meaning behind secret messages found throughout Washington? Did America's Founding Fathers know something about ancient aliens that the general public did not?

programme.title: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: In September of 1944, 17,000 US Marines hit the beaches of the tiny coral island of Peleliu. What they expect to be a three day operation turns into 74 terrible days and one of the most ferocious battles of the Pacific War

programme.title: Heroes Of War
programme.desc: Although considered the achievement of the UK's Bletchley Park, this show explores how a small group of Polish mathematicians led the struggle to crack the Nazi code

programme.desc: How did life evolve on Earth? What will life look like on other planets? These and other questions will be answered by a diverse group of scientists. Watch as experiments are done to see if life exists on earth-like planets beyond our solar system

programme.title: Brick Mansions
programme.desc: Lino (David Bale) is trying to live a safe life, but when his friend is kidnapped by a ruthless crime lord, he co-operates with undercover officer Damien (Paul Walker) who meanwhile, is trying to infiltrate the crime lord's gang to defuse a neutron bomb he controls that could destroy the whole city

programme.title: The Watch
programme.desc: Four men form a neighborhood watch group to escape their dull family routines. When they discover their idyllic suburb is overrun with aliens in disguise, they have no choice but to save their neighborhoods and the world

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: Even-keeled businessman Sandy Patterson (Jason Bateman) travels from Denver to Miami to track down the woman (Melissa McCarthy) who's been spending his money after stealing his identity

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: The film follows Wesley Gibson (James McAvoy), a frustrated Account Manager who discovers that he is the son of a professional assassin and decides to join The Fraternity, a secret guild in which his father worked

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Dwight McCarthy (Josh Brolin) struggles with his inner demons and tries to maintain control until his former lover, Ava Lord (Eva Green), returns, wanting his help to escape her abusive husband Damien Lord (Marton Csokas) and his massive bodyguard. When John Hartigan (Bruce Willis) meets up with Nancy, (Jessica Alba), Marv (Mickey Rourke) regains consciousness on a highway overlooking the Projects, surrounded by several dead young men, and unable to remember how to get there. Johnny (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), a cocky gambler, disguises a darker mission to destroy the biggest villain in Sin City at his own game, but unfortunately, he beats the wrong man and events take an unfavorable turn. Nancy Callahan, now toughened, struggles to cope with John Hartigan's death while plotting to kill Senator Roark (Power Boothe)

programme.title: The Rebound
programme.desc: This picture is a romantic comedy that was directed by Bart Freundlich. Catherine Zeta-Jones and Justin Bartha star in the leading roles. Sandy (Catherine Zeta-Jones) discovers that her husband has been (cheating on her). She gets a quick divorce and leaves for New York with her young son and daughter. Upon moving to New York, Sandy begins to get close to a 25 year-old waiter named Aram (Justin Bartha). As Aram becomes Sandy’s children’s full time nanny, chemistry begins to brew between him and Sandy. Thus they enter into a relationship which is faced with one major challenge: Can a relationship between a 40 year-old and a 25 year old ever succeed

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: This action-comedy picture follows the story of Jen Kornfeldt (Katherine Heigl) who has just broken up with her boyfriend. She travels to the French Riviera disenchanted with love and Romance. At this point she just happens to bump into the man of her dreams, but is this man who he says he is

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: This production is an action-comedy starring Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman and John Malkovich. The title is a film adaptation of the comic book by the same name. Former covert ops CIA agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) is trying to get adjusted to life in retirement but can’t seem to get over the mind dulling boredom and loneliness of life in retirement. Matters take on a different twist when Frank’s house is raided in the middle of the night by a group of assassins. Frank manages to kill them off and thereafter returns to his long-lost black ops lifestyle – this time he is his own boss and his objective is to find out who exactly is trying to kill him

programme.title: RED 2
programme.desc: With two top contract killers receiving contracts to kill Frank (Bruce Willis), the retired CIA agent reunites his team. The quest is global this time as they're trying to track down a missing portable nuclear device. From London to Paris and Moscow the team is trying to reach their target dealing with their past and desires of vengeance

programme.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
programme.desc: A painfully introverted freshman is taken under the wings of two effervescent seniors who welcome him to the real world. Stephen Chbosky directs based on his classic 1999 novel

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin suffering from psychogenic amnesia, wants to learn more of his past as he is once more enveloped in a conspiracy involving the CIA and Operation Treadstone and forced to continue is past life as an assasin for survival

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Once again, Jason Bourne is hunted by the CIA, at the same time where (Nikkei Parsons) penetrates the intelligence database and carries everything she needs. Heather Lee uncover this penetration, and inform her manager Dewey, who orders his team to catch Bourne and Parsons, whom their paths met, which leads Bourne to know more about his previous life

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: John 'Breacher' Wharton (Arnold Schwarzenegger) leads an elite DEA task force that takes on the world's deadliest cartels. When the team successfully executes a high-stakes raid on a cartel safe house, they think their work is done – until, one-by-one, the team members mysteriously start to be eliminated. As the body count rises, everyone is a suspect

programme.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
programme.desc: A painfully introverted freshman is taken under the wings of two effervescent seniors who welcome him to the real world. Stephen Chbosky directs based on his classic 1999 novel

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: This latest crime picture brings together an ensemble cast that features Don Cheadle, Wesley Snipes, Ethan Hawke and Richard Gere. The film is directed by Antoine Fuqua. The film depicts the lives of three NYPD police officers that are going through hard times. Detective Salvatore Prodica (Ethan Hawke) is finding it impossible to make ends meet in his rapidly expanding household and has resorted to morally questionable means of making more income. Officer Eddie Dugan (Richard Gere) is only one week away from retirement, but he doesn’t have much of a life to look forward to after retirement. Detective Clarence Butler (Don Cheadle) has been stuck doing the same rounds for quite some time and is desperate for a promotion and a desk job. What events will make the paths of these three men collide and which of them will come out honored or dishonored, dead or alive

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The film centers on an elite assassin who was genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, and is known only by the last two digits on the barcode tattooed on the back of his neck. Teaming up with a young woman, his latest target is a mega-corporation that plans to unlock the secret of Agent 47's past to create an army of killers

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The film centers on an elite assassin who was genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, and is known only by the last two digits on the barcode tattooed on the back of his neck. Teaming up with a young woman, his latest target is a mega-corporation that plans to unlock the secret of Agent 47's past to create an army of killers

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: This picture is a science fiction film directed by J. J. Abrams. It is a re-boot of the (Star Trek franchise) and features the main characters of the original Star Trek series, portrayed by a new cast. The picture has received much critical praise and was nominated for four Oscars – winning the Academy Award for Best Makeup, making it the first Star Trek film to win an Oscar. In the year 2233, Federation starship USS Kelvin is attacked by the Narada, a Romulan ship. The Kelvin’s captain is killed. Acting Captain George Kirk (Chris Hemsworth) orders the evacuation of the ship’s personnel, including his pregnant wife who is in labor. Moments before the Kelvin’s destruction, George and his wife decide to name their son Jim. The film then jumps several years to the story of young Spock. Spock is discriminated against by his peers on Vulcan for being half-human. After he matures, he opts to join Starfleet rather than the Vulcan Science Academy. Soon afterwards, the principal crew members of the original Star Trek series: James, Spock and Leonard McCoy, find themselves best situated to respond to a distress call from Vulcan. Thus, the inexperienced cadets find themselves launched head long into a confrontation with the Narada and its captain Nero who was responsible for killing James’ father several years prior

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: In this provocative thriller from Steven Soderbergh, a successful New York couple's world unravels when a new drug prescribed by Emily's psychiatrist (Jude Law) - intended to treat anxiety - has unexpected side effects.

programme.title: Upside Down
programme.desc: Adam and Eden, who fell in love as teens, face a strange obstacle: they live on twin worlds whose gravitational pulls separate the wealthy from the poor and exploited. Ten years after being forced apart, Adam learns she's alive and sets out on a dangerous quest to find his long lost love.

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Jonas, a young man, is living in a seemingly ideal, if colorless, world of conformity and contentment. Yet as he begins to spend time with The Giver, who is the sole keeper of all the community's memories, Jonas quickly begins to discover the dark and deadly truths of his community's secret past.

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: Theodore Twombly (Joaquin Phoenix) is a complex, soulful and lonely writer who has just come out of a relationship heartbroken. He gets involved in a friendship with an advanced operating system impersonating Samantha (Scarlett Johansson), which eventually turns into a romance.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: In the future, a parasitic alien race invades and overtakes humanity, occupying our bodies and erasing our memories. When Melanie Stryder becomes a host, her will and her memories are strong enough to put up a fight. She forms a bond with her host and sets out to help other free humans.

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: Blu is a rare blue parrot who is afraid of heights. He lives a quiet life in a small town somewhere in the United States. Blu’s life changes when he meets “Jewel” – a daring female parrot who represents all that he lacks. Nevertheless the pair fall in love and take a trip together to Rio de Janeiro in Brazil where Blu learns to shake of his fears in what becomes their journey of a lifetime

programme.desc: Snoopy, the world's most lovable beagle ­ and flying ace ­embarks upon his greatest mission as he takes to the skies to pursue his arch-nemesis The Red Baron, while his best pal, Charlie Brown, begins his own epic quest

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: This picture is a drama about the founding of the popular social network website “Facebook”. The film stars Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield and Justin Timberlake. David Fincher was the film’s director. Mark Zuckerberg is a Harvard student. After breaking up with his girlfriend, Mark has the idea to create a website where Harvard students can rate the attractiveness of females at the school. A friend helps him set up the site and it proves to be a big hit. Harvard authorities are not so impressed however when heavy traffic on the website disrupts part of Harvard’s network. He is punished with six months academic probation and also ends up making himself ridiculous in front of the female community. Soon afterwards Mark renews his efforts. The site launched by him and Eduardo this time round allows people to look up their friends without violating privacy. Thus, Marks new idea quickly takes hold and thenceforth it expands exponentially and Mark Zuckerberg’s brainchild becomes a massive hit. However, as the movie’s tag line goes: “You Don’t Get to 500 Million Friends without Making a Few Enemies”
